Text.Name: GrowPercent
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a dragon.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a dragon.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a dragon.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a phoenix.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a phoenix.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a phoenix.
Text.RaceExtra.2.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a fox.
Text.RaceExtra.2.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a fox.
Text.RaceExtra.2.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a fox.
Text.RaceExtra.3.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a canine.
Text.RaceExtra.3.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a canine.
Text.RaceExtra.3.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a canine.
